[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpeolppztj[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexif_from_data_fuzzer -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA heap-buffer-overflow vulnerability has been detected in the libexif library [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mduring fuzzing of the `exif_from_data_fuzzer` target. The issue manifests as a [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read operation that attempts to access memory [0m[1;36m7[0m[39m bytes beyond the end of a [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m56[0m[39m-byte allocated heap buffer. The overflow occurs in the `exif_get_slong` function[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwithin `exif-utils.c` at line [0m[1;36m137[0m[39m, column [0m[1;36m36[0m[39m, during the processing of Fuji [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmakernote data.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe issue represents a **heap-buffer-overflow** vulnerability with a [0m[32m"READ of size [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [32m1"[0m[39m classification. According to the AddressSanitizer [0m[1;39m([0m[39mASAN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m report, the scariness [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mscore is [0m[1;36m12[0m[39m, indicating a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte-read-heap-buffer-overflow.[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Stack Trace Analysis[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe vulnerability is triggered through the following call chain:[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Entry Point**: `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` in [0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[35m/src/[0m[95mexif_from_data_fuzzer.cc[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m51:16[0m[39m` - The fuzzer harness that feeds test data to [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe library[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Data Processing**: `exif_data_new_from_data` in [0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[35m/src/libexif/libexif/[0m[95mexif-data.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m159:2[0m[39m` - Creates a new EXIF data structure from [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mraw data[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Data Loading**: `exif_data_load_data` in [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[35m/src/libexif/libexif/[0m[95mexif-data.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m1025:2[0m[39m` - Loads and parses the EXIF data[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Makernote Processing**: `exif_mnote_data_fuji_load` in [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[35m/src/libexif/libexif/fuji/[0m[95mexif-mnote-data-fuji.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m175:11[0m[39m` - Processes Fuji-specific[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmakernote data[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Value Extraction**: `exif_get_long` in [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[35m/src/libexif/libexif/[0m[95mexif-utils.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m167:17[0m[39m` - Retrieves a long integer value[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. **Vulnerability Location**: `exif_get_slong` in [0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[35m/src/libexif/libexif/[0m[95mexif-utils.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m137:36[0m[39m` - Reads a signed long integer, causing [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe out-of-bounds read[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Memory Layout[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe ASAN report provides detailed information about the problematic memory access:[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Invalid Access Address**: `[0m[1;36m0x50600000011f[0m[39m`[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Allocated Region**: [0m[1;36m56[0m[39m-byte region at `[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x5060000000e0[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0x506000000118[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Overflow Distance**: [0m[1;36m7[0m[39m bytes beyond the allocated buffer[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Shadow Byte Pattern**: The memory map shows `fa` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mheap left redzone[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m at the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maccess location, confirming the out-of-bounds access[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Key Observations[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. The vulnerability occurs during the parsing of manufacturer-specific [0m[1;39m([0m[39mFuji[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmakernote data, suggesting issues with bounds checking when processing [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvendor-specific EXIF extensions.[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. The overflow happens in utility functions [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`exif_get_slong` and `exif_get_long`[0m[1;39m)[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat are responsible for extracting multi-byte integer values from binary data.[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. The [0m[1;36m7[0m[39m-byte overflow beyond a [0m[1;36m56[0m[39m-byte buffer indicates that the code is [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mattempting to read a multi-byte value that extends beyond the available data.[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. The issue is reproducible with a specific test case as indicated by the fuzzer [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mconfiguration running with `-[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m`.[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Areas for Investigation[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mTo gain a holistic understanding of this vulnerability, the following parts of the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcodebase should be examined:[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **`[0m[35m/src/libexif/libexif/[0m[95mexif-utils.c[0m[39m`**: [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Lines around [0m[1;36m137[0m[39m in `exif_get_slong` function[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Lines around [0m[1;36m167[0m[39m in `exif_get_long` function[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Understand how these functions extract integer values from byte buffers[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **`[0m[35m/src/libexif/libexif/fuji/[0m[95mexif-mnote-data-fuji.c[0m[39m`**:[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Line [0m[1;36m175[0m[39m in `exif_mnote_data_fuji_load` function[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Examine how Fuji makernote data is parsed and how buffer boundaries are [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvalidated[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **`[0m[35m/src/libexif/libexif/[0m[95mexif-data.c[0m[39m`**:[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Line [0m[1;36m1025[0m[39m in `exif_data_load_data` function[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Line [0m[1;36m159[0m[39m in `exif_data_new_from_data` function[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Review the overall data loading and validation logic[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Buffer Management**: [0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Investigate how buffer sizes are calculated and tracked throughout the parsing[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprocess[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Examine whether length fields from the input data are validated before use[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Vendor-Specific Makernote Handlers**: [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Check if similar issues exist in other manufacturer-specific makernote parsing[0m [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m352[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mo2 + [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mo2 + [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mo2 + [0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mo2 + [0m[1;36m7[0m[1;39m][0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m353[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m354[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Skip version number *[0m[35m/[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m355[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mo2 += [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m356[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m357[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Skip an unknown byte [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m00[0m[39m or 0A[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. *[0m[35m/[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m358[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mo2 += [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m359[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m360[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Skip [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m unknown bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. *[0m[35m/[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m361[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mo2 += [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m362[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m363[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[35m/[0m[39m*[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m364[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m * Byte order. From here the data offset[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m365[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m * gets calculated.[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m366[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m367[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mdatao = o2;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m368[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39m!strncmp [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m&buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mo2[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, [0m[32m"II"[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m369[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39mn->order = EXIF_BYTE_ORDER_INTEL;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m370[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39melse if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m!strncmp [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m&buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mo2[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, [0m[32m"MM"[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m371[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39mn->order = EXIF_BYTE_ORDER_MOTOROLA;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m372[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39melse [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m373[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39mexif_log [0m[1;39m([0m[39men->log, EXIF_LOG_CODE_DEBUG,[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m374[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[32m"ExifMnoteDataOlympus"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"Unknown "[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m375[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[32m"byte order '%c%c'"[0m[39m, buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mo2[0m[1;39m][0m[39m,[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m376[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mo2 + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m377[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m379[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mo2 += [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m380[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m381[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Skip [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m unknown bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m00[0m[39m 2A[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. *[0m[35m/[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m382[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mo2 += [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m383[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m384[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Go to where the number of entries is. *[0m[35m/[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m385[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mo2 = datao + exif_get_long [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf + o2, n->order[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m390[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[32m"Parsing Nikon maker note v0 [0m[32m([0m[32m0x%02x, %02x, %02x, "[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m391[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[32m"%02x, %02x, %02x, %02x, %02x[0m[32m)[0m[32m..."[0m[39m,[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m392[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mo2 + [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mo2 + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mo2 + [0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mo2 + [0m[1;36m3[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m393[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mo2 + [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mo2 + [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mo2 + [0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mo2 + [0m[1;36m7[0m[1;39m][0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m394[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m 1b is # of entries in Motorola order - the rest should also [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbe in MM order *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m400[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[32m"Unknown Olympus variant %i."[0m[39m, n->version[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                 [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m405[0m[39m:    [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mCHECKOVERFLOW[0m[1;39m([0m[39mo2,buf_size,[0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m406[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mexif_log [0m[1;39m([0m[39men->log, EXIF_LOG_CODE_CORRUPT_DATA,[0m                      [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m408[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m413[0m[39m:    [0m[39mo2 += [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m414[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m415[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Just use an arbitrary max tag limit here to avoid needing to much memory[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mor time. There are [0m[1;36m150[0m[39m named tags currently.[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m416[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * The format allows specifying the same range of memory as often as it [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcan, so this multiplies quickly. *[0m[35m/[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m417[0m[39m:    [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc > [0m[1;36m300[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m418[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mexif_log [0m[1;39m([0m[39men->log, EXIF_LOG_CODE_CORRUPT_DATA, [0m[32m"ExifMnoteOlympus"[0m[39m, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [32m"Too much tags [0m[32m([0m[32m%d[0m[32m)[0m[32m in Olympus MakerNote"[0m[39m, c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m812[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mdata->priv->md = exif_mnote_data_fuji_new [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdata->priv->mem[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m813[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m814[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* NOTE: Must do Pentax detection last because some of the[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m815[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * heuristics are pretty general. *[0m[35m/[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m816[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mmnoteid = exif_mnote_data_pentax_identify [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdata, e[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m817[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mexif_log [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdata->priv->log, EXIF_LOG_CODE_DEBUG,[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m818[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[32m"ExifData"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"Pentax MakerNote variant type %d"[0m[39m, mnoteid[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m819[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mdata->priv->md = exif_mnote_data_pentax_new [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdata->priv->mem[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m820[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m821[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m* Marcus: disabled until apple makernote can also be saved[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m822[0m[39m:    [0m[39melse if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mmnoteid = exif_mnote_data_apple_identify [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdata, e[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m823[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mexif_log [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdata->priv->log, EXIF_LOG_CODE_DEBUG,[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m824[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[32m"ExifData"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"Apple MakerNote variant type %d"[0m[39m, mnoteid[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m825[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mdata->priv->md = exif_mnote_data_apple_new [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdata->priv->mem[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m826[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m827[0m[39m:*[0m[35m/[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m828[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m829[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m830[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * If we are able to interpret the maker note, do so.[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m831[0m[39m:    [0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m832[0m[39m:    [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdata->priv->md[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m833[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mexif_mnote_data_log [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdata->priv->md, data->priv->log[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m834[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mexif_mnote_data_set_byte_order [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdata->priv->md,[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m835[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39mdata->priv->order[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m836[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mexif_mnote_data_set_offset [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdata->priv->md,[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m837[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39m    data->priv->offset_mnote[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m838[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mexif_mnote_data_load [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdata->priv->md, d, ds[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m839[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m840[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlibexif/exif-data.[0m[1;92mc:950[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m1030[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m950[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m951[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m952[0m[39m:    [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmemcmp [0m[1;39m([0m[39md, ExifHeader, [0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m953[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mexif_log [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdata->priv->log, EXIF_LOG_CODE_CORRUPT_DATA,[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m954[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39m  [0m[32m"ExifData"[0m[39m, [0m[1;35m_[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"EXIF header not found."[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m955[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m956[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m957[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m958[0m[39m:    [0m[39mexif_log [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdata->priv->log, EXIF_LOG_CODE_DEBUG, [0m[32m"ExifData"[0m[39m,[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m959[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  [0m[32m"Found EXIF header."[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m960[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m961[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Sanity check the data length *[0m[35m/[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m962[0m[39m:    [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mds < [0m[1;36m14[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m963[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m964[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m965[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* The JPEG APP1 section can be no longer than [0m[1;36m64[0m[39m KiB [0m[1;39m([0m[39mincluding a[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m966[0m[39m:    [0m[39m   [0m[1;36m16[0m[39m-bit length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, so cap the data length to protect against overflow[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m967[0m[39m:    [0m[39m   in future offset calculations *[0m[35m/[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m968[0m[39m:    [0m[39mfullds = ds;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m969[0m[39m:    [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mds > [0m[1;36m0xfffe[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m970[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mds = [0m[1;36m0xfffe[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m971[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m972[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Byte order [0m[1;39m([0m[39moffset [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m, length [0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m973[0m[39m:    [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39m!memcmp [0m[1;39m([0m[39md + [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m, [0m[32m"II"[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m974[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mdata->priv->order = EXIF_BYTE_ORDER_INTEL;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m975[0m[39m:    [0m[39melse if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m!memcmp [0m[1;39m([0m[39md + [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m, [0m[32m"MM"[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m976[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mdata->priv->order = EXIF_BYTE_ORDER_MOTOROLA;[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m977[0m[39m:    [0m[39melse [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m978[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mexif_log [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdata->priv->log, EXIF_LOG_CODE_CORRUPT_DATA,[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m979[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39m  [0m[32m"ExifData"[0m[39m, [0m[1;35m_[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"Unknown encoding."[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m980[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m981[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m982[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m983[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Fixed value *[0m[35m/[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m984[0m[39m:    [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexif_get_short [0m[1;39m([0m[39md + [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, data->priv->order[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m0x002a[0m[1;39m)[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m985[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m986[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m987[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* IFD [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m offset *[0m[35m/[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m988[0m[39m:    [0m[39moffset = exif_get_long [0m[1;39m([0m[39md + [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, data->priv->order[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m989[0m[39m:    [0m[39mexif_log [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdata->priv->log, EXIF_LOG_CODE_DEBUG, [0m[32m"ExifData"[0m[39m, [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m990[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  [0m[32m"IFD 0 at %i."[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m991[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m992[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* ds is restricted to [0m[1;36m16[0m[39m bit above, so offset is restricted too, and [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moffset+[0m[1;36m8[0m[39m should not overflow. *[0m[35m/[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m993[0m[39m:    [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39moffset > ds || offset + [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m > ds[0m[1;39m)[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m994[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m995[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m996[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Parse the actual exif data [0m[1;39m([0m[39musually offset [0m[1;36m14[0m[39m from start[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m997[0m[39m:    [0m[39mexif_data_load_data_content [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdata, EXIF_IFD_0, d + [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m, ds - [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m, offset, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m998[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m999[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* IFD [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m offset *[0m[35m/[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1000[0m[39m:   [0m[39mn = exif_get_short [0m[1;39m([0m[39md + [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m + offset, data->priv->order[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1001[0m[39m:   [0m[35m/[0m[39m* offset < [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m<<[0m[1;36m16[0m[39m, n is [0m[1;36m16[0m[39m bit at most, so this op will not overflow *[0m[35m/[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1002[0m[39m:   [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39moffset + [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m12[0m[39m * n + [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m > ds[0m[1;39m)[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1003[0m[39m:   [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1004[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1005[0m[39m:   [0m[39moffset = exif_get_long [0m[1;39m([0m[39md + [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m + offset + [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m12[0m[39m * n, data->priv->order[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1006[0m[39m:   [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39moffset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1007[0m[39m:   [0m[39m        [0m[39mexif_log [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdata->priv->log, EXIF_LOG_CODE_DEBUG, [0m[32m"ExifData"[0m[39m,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1008[0m[39m:   [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39m  [0m[32m"IFD 1 at %i."[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1009[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1010[0m[39m:   [0m[39m        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Sanity check. ds is ensured to be above [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m above, offset is 16bit[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m*[0m[35m/[0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1011[0m[39m:   [0m[39m        [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39moffset > ds - [0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1012[0m[39m:   [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39mexif_log [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdata->priv->log, EXIF_LOG_CODE_CORRUPT_DATA,[0m      [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m955[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m956[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m957[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m958[0m[39m:    [0m[39mexif_log [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdata->priv->log, EXIF_LOG_CODE_DEBUG, [0m[32m"ExifData"[0m[39m,[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m959[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  [0m[32m"Found EXIF header."[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m960[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m961[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Sanity check the data length *[0m[35m/[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m962[0m[39m:    [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mds < [0m[1;36m14[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m963[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m964[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m965[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* The JPEG APP1 section can be no longer than [0m[1;36m64[0m[39m KiB [0m[1;39m([0m[39mincluding a[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m966[0m[39m:    [0m[39m   [0m[1;36m16[0m[39m-bit length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, so cap the data length to protect against overflow[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m967[0m[39m:    [0m[39m   in future offset calculations *[0m[35m/[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m968[0m[39m:    [0m[39mfullds = ds;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m969[0m[39m:    [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mds > [0m[1;36m0xfffe[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m970[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mds = [0m[1;36m0xfffe[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m971[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m972[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Byte order [0m[1;39m([0m[39moffset [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m, length [0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m973[0m[39m:    [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39m!memcmp [0m[1;39m([0m[39md + [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m, [0m[32m"II"[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m974[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mdata->priv->order = EXIF_BYTE_ORDER_INTEL;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m975[0m[39m:    [0m[39melse if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m!memcmp [0m[1;39m([0m[39md + [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m, [0m[32m"MM"[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m976[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mdata->priv->order = EXIF_BYTE_ORDER_MOTOROLA;[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m977[0m[39m:    [0m[39melse [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m978[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mexif_log [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdata->priv->log, EXIF_LOG_CODE_CORRUPT_DATA,[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m979[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39m  [0m[32m"ExifData"[0m[39m, [0m[1;35m_[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"Unknown encoding."[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m980[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m981[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m982[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m983[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Fixed value *[0m[35m/[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m984[0m[39m:    [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexif_get_short [0m[1;39m([0m[39md + [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, data->priv->order[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m0x002a[0m[1;39m)[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m985[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m986[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m987[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* IFD [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m offset *[0m[35m/[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m988[0m[39m:    [0m[39moffset = exif_get_long [0m[1;39m([0m[39md + [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, data->priv->order[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m989[0m[39m:    [0m[39mexif_log [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdata->priv->log, EXIF_LOG_CODE_DEBUG, [0m[32m"ExifData"[0m[39m, [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m990[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  [0m[32m"IFD 0 at %i."[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m991[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m992[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* ds is restricted to [0m[1;36m16[0m[39m bit above, so offset is restricted too, and [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moffset+[0m[1;36m8[0m[39m should not overflow. *[0m[35m/[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m993[0m[39m:    [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39moffset > ds || offset + [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m > ds[0m[1;39m)[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m994[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m995[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m996[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Parse the actual exif data [0m[1;39m([0m[39musually offset [0m[1;36m14[0m[39m from start[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m997[0m[39m:    [0m[39mexif_data_load_data_content [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdata, EXIF_IFD_0, d + [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m, ds - [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m, offset, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m998[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m999[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* IFD [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m offset *[0m[35m/[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1000[0m[39m:   [0m[39mn = exif_get_short [0m[1;39m([0m[39md + [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m + offset, data->priv->order[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1001[0m[39m:   [0m[35m/[0m[39m* offset < [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m<<[0m[1;36m16[0m[39m, n is [0m[1;36m16[0m[39m bit at most, so this op will not overflow *[0m[35m/[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1002[0m[39m:   [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39moffset + [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m12[0m[39m * n + [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m > ds[0m[1;39m)[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1003[0m[39m:   [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1004[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1005[0m[39m:   [0m[39moffset = exif_get_long [0m[1;39m([0m[39md + [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m + offset + [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m12[0m[39m * n, data->priv->order[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1006[0m[39m:   [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39moffset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1007[0m[39m:   [0m[39m        [0m[39mexif_log [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdata->priv->log, EXIF_LOG_CODE_DEBUG, [0m[32m"ExifData"[0m[39m,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1008[0m[39m:   [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39m  [0m[32m"IFD 1 at %i."[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1009[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1010[0m[39m:   [0m[39m        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Sanity check. ds is ensured to be above [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m above, offset is 16bit[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m*[0m[35m/[0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1011[0m[39m:   [0m[39m        [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39moffset > ds - [0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1012[0m[39m:   [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39mexif_log [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdata->priv->log, EXIF_LOG_CODE_CORRUPT_DATA,[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1013[0m[39m:   [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39m  [0m[32m"ExifData"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"Bogus offset of IFD1."[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1014[0m[39m:   [0m[39m        [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1015[0m[39m:   [0m[39m        [0m[39m   exif_data_load_data_content [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdata, EXIF_IFD_1, d + [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m, ds - [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moffset, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1016[0m[39m:   [0m[39m        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1017[0m[39m:   [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1018[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1019[0m[39m:   [0m[35m/[0m[39m*[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1020[0m[39m:   [0m[39m * If we got an EXIF_TAG_MAKER_NOTE, try to interpret it. Some[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1021[0m[39m:   [0m[39m * cameras use pointers in the maker note tag that point to the[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1022[0m[39m:   [0m[39m * space between IFDs. Here is the only place where we have access[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1023[0m[39m:   [0m[39m * to that data.[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1024[0m[39m:   [0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1025[0m[39m:   [0m[1;35minterpret_maker_note[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdata, d, fullds[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1026[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1027[0m[39m:   [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Fixup tags if requested *[0m[35m/[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1028[0m[39m:   [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdata->priv->options & EXIF_DATA_OPTION_FOLLOW_SPECIFICATION[0m[1;39m)[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1029[0m[39m:   [0m[39m        [0m[39mexif_data_fix [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdata[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1030[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlibexif/fuji/exif-mnote-data-fuji.[0m[1;92mc:166[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m176[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m166[0m[39m:    [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mCHECKOVERFLOW[0m[1;39m([0m[39mn->offset, buf_size, [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m+[0m[1;36m8[0m[39m+[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m167[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mexif_log [0m[1;39m([0m[39men->log, EXIF_LOG_CODE_CORRUPT_DATA,[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m168[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39m  [0m[32m"ExifMnoteDataFuji"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"Short MakerNote"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m169[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m170[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m171[0m[39m:    [0m[39mdatao = [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m + n->offset;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m172[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m173[0m[39m:    [0m[39mn->order = EXIF_BYTE_ORDER_INTEL;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m174[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m175[0m[39m:    [0m[39mdatao += exif_get_long [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf + datao + [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, EXIF_BYTE_ORDER_INTEL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m176[0m[39m:    [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mCHECKOVERFLOW[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdatao, buf_size, [0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlibexif/exif-data.[0m[1;92mc:192[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m234[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m192[0m[39m:    [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39ms > [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m193[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mdoff = exif_get_long [0m[1;39m([0m[39md + offset + [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, data->priv->order[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m194[0m[39m:    [0m[39melse[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m195[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mdoff = offset + [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
