[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m167[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mexif_log [0m[1;39m([0m[39men->log, EXIF_LOG_CODE_CORRUPT_DATA,[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m168[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39m  [0m[32m"ExifMnoteDataFuji"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"Short MakerNote"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m169[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m170[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m171[0m[39m:    [0m[39mdatao = [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m + n->offset;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m172[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m173[0m[39m:    [0m[39mn->order = EXIF_BYTE_ORDER_INTEL;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m174[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m175[0m[39m:    [0m[39mdatao += exif_get_long [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf + datao + [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, EXIF_BYTE_ORDER_INTEL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m176[0m[39m:    [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mCHECKOVERFLOW[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdatao, buf_size, [0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Analysis Summary[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter thorough analysis of the code and crash report, I've identified the root [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcause of the heap-buffer-overflow vulnerability. The issue lies in how the buffer [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msize is calculated and passed to the Fuji makernote handler.[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Root Cause[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe vulnerability occurs due to a mismatch between:[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **The actual buffer size** allocated by the fuzzer [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m56[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **The `buf_size` parameter** passed to `exif_mnote_data_fuji_load`[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe critical flow is:[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. In `exif_data_load_data` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m866[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m942[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, if the input contains JPEG markers, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe code reads an APP1 length field from the **untrusted input data** at line [0m[1;36m926[0m[39m:[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```c[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   len = [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39munsigned int[0m[1;39m)[0m[39md[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m][0m[1;39m)[0m[39m << [0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m | d[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. At line [0m[1;36m927[0m[39m, there's a check: `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlen > ds[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` which should prevent the issue, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbut this check validates against the **current** `ds` value after pointer [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39madjustments, not the original buffer size.[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. At line [0m[1;36m941[0m[39m: `ds = len - [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m;` - The data size is set based on the untrusted [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength field.[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. At line [0m[1;36m968[0m[39m: `fullds = ds;` - This potentially inflated value becomes `fullds`.[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. At line [0m[1;36m1025[0m[39m: `[0m[1;35minterpret_maker_note[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdata, d, fullds[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;` - The Fuji handler [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreceives `buf_size = fullds`, which may be larger than the actual allocated buffer.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. In the Fuji handler at line [0m[1;36m175[0m[39m, when reading from `buf + datao + [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m`, the bounds[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcheck at line [0m[1;36m166[0m[39m uses the inflated `buf_size`, allowing an out-of-bounds read.[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### The Real Problem[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mLooking more carefully at lines [0m[1;36m870[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m942[0m[39m, I notice that when the JPEG path is taken:[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The pointer `d` gets advanced multiple times [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m876[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m882[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m905[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m924[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m940[0m[1;39m)[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The size `ds` gets decremented correspondingly [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m877[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m883[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m906[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m925[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m941[0m[1;39m)[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- But at line [0m[1;36m941[0m[39m: `ds = len - [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m;` **overwrites** `ds` with a value from the input[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe issue is that after advancing the pointer `d` through JPEG markers, the code [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msets `ds` based on a length field from the input without accounting for how much of[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe **original buffer** was already consumed. This can result in `d + ds` pointing [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbeyond the actual allocated buffer.[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Detailed Fix Strategy[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fix should be applied in `libexif/exif-data.c` in the `exif_data_load_data` [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction:[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Track the original buffer boundary**: Before any pointer/size adjustments, [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msave the original buffer start and size to calculate the actual remaining buffer [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msize.[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Validate adjusted size against original buffer**: After line [0m[1;36m941[0m[39m where `ds = [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlen - [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m;` is set, add a check to ensure that `d + ds` does not exceed the original [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer boundary [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`d_orig + original_ds`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Cap the size appropriately**: If the calculated `ds` would cause buffer [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverrun, cap it to the actual remaining buffer size.[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fix should be implemented as follows:[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Location**: `libexif/exif-data.c`, function `exif_data_load_data` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m846[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m1030[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Changes needed**:[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39ma[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m At the start of the function [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m854[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, track the original buffer end:[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Save `d_orig` [0m[1;39m([0m[39malready done at line [0m[1;36m853[0m[1;39m)[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Save `const unsigned char *d_end = d_orig + ds;` to mark the buffer boundary[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mb[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m After line [0m[1;36m941[0m[39m where `ds = len - [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m;` is set, add validation:[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```c[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m After line [0m[1;36m941[0m[39m: ds = len - [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Validate that d + ds doesn't exceed original buffer[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   if [0m[1;39m([0m[39md + ds > d_end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       ds = d_end - d;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Cap to actual remaining buffer[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mds < [0m[1;36m14[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m[39m   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Need minimum [0m[1;36m14[0m[39m bytes for EXIF header[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           LOG_TOO_SMALL;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           return;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Similarly, after line [0m[1;36m968[0m[39m where `fullds = ds;` is set, ensure fullds doesn't [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexceed the actual buffer:[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```c[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m After line [0m[1;36m968[0m[39m: fullds = ds;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Validate fullds against actual buffer boundary[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   if [0m[1;39m([0m[39md + fullds > d_end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       fullds = d_end - d;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Justification[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Why this is the optimal approach:**[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Preserves existing logic**: The fix doesn't change the fundamental parsing [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlogic, only adds safety bounds checking.[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Addresses root cause**: By tracking the original buffer boundary and [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvalidating all size calculations against it, we prevent the inflated `buf_size` [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfrom being passed to makernote handlers.[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Defense in depth**: Even if there are other paths that could cause similar [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39missues, capping sizes to actual buffer boundaries provides comprehensive [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprotection.[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Minimal performance impact**: The fix adds only simple pointer arithmetic and [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcomparisons.[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Follows existing patterns**: The code already has similar validation at lines [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m198[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m208[0m[39m in `exif_data_load_data_entry`. This fix extends that pattern to the [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtop-level data loading.[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**How it addresses the vulnerability:**[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Currently: Fuji handler receives `buf_size = [0m[1;36m98[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfrom untrusted input[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m but [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mactual buffer is [0m[1;36m56[0m[39m bytes[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- After fix: The size will be capped to [0m[1;36m56[0m[39m bytes before reaching the makernote [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhandler[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The CHECKOVERFLOW macro at line [0m[1;36m166[0m[39m in the Fuji handler will now correctly detect[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe overflow with the accurate buffer size[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**No breaking changes:**[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- For valid EXIF data, the length field will match the actual data, so no capping [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moccurs[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- For malformed data, the function will safely reject it or process only the valid [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mportion[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The fix doesn't modify any vendor-specific makernote handlers or utility [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunctions[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Existing tests will continue to pass as they use well-formed EXIF data[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Side effects mitigation:**[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The fix may cause some previously [0m[32m"accepted"[0m[39m malformed EXIF data to be rejected, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbut this is the intended security improvement[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- No functionality is removed; we're only enforcing correct buffer boundaries[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The error logging mechanisms remain in place to help diagnose issues[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[01/08/26 05:14:18][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=297148;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=469213;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/user/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mlibexif[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpeolppztj[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexif_from_data_fuzzer -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue involves a heap-buffer-overflow error detected by [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAddressSanitizer in the libexif library. The overflow occurs when reading [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m byte at[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maddress [0m[1;36m0x50600000011f[0m[39m, which is [0m[1;36m7[0m[39m bytes after a [0m[1;36m56[0m[39m-byte allocated region. The [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39merror originates in the `exif_get_slong` function in `exif-utils.c` and propagates [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthrough `exif_get_long`, `exif_mnote_data_fuji_load`, and `exif_data_load_data` [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbefore being triggered by the fuzzer. [0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA patch was applied to `exif-data.c` that adds boundary checking to prevent buffer [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflows by tracking the original buffer boundaries. However, after applying the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpatch, the same heap-buffer-overflow error persists at the identical memory [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlocation with the same stack trace, indicating that the patch did not successfully [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mresolve the issue.[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Initial Issue Analysis[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe AddressSanitizer report reveals a heap-buffer-overflow vulnerability with the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfollowing characteristics:[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Error Details:**[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Type: READ of size [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m at address [0m[1;36m0x50600000011f[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Severity: SCARINESS score of [0m[1;36m12[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte-read-heap-buffer-overflow[0m[1;39m)[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The address is located [0m[1;36m7[0m[39m bytes after a [0m[1;36m56[0m[39m-byte allocated region [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x5060000000e0[0m[39m, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m0x506000000118[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Call Stack:**[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. The error originates in `exif_get_slong` at [0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[35m/src/libexif/libexif/[0m[95mexif-utils.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m137:36[0m[39m`[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Called from `exif_get_long` at `[0m[35m/src/libexif/libexif/[0m[95mexif-utils.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m167:17[0m[39m`[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Called from `exif_mnote_data_fuji_load` at [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[35m/src/libexif/libexif/fuji/[0m[95mexif-mnote-data-fuji.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m175:11[0m[39m`[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Called from `exif_data_load_data` at `[0m[35m/src/libexif/libexif/[0m[95mexif-data.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m1025:2[0m[39m`[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Called from `exif_data_new_from_data` at [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[35m/src/libexif/libexif/[0m[95mexif-data.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m159:2[0m[39m`[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Entry point is `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` at `[0m[35m/src/[0m[95mexif_from_data_fuzzer.cc[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m51:16[0m[39m`[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe allocation of the [0m[1;36m56[0m[39m-byte region occurred through `malloc` and `operator new` [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mduring the fuzzer's execution.[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Patch Attempt Description[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch modifies the `exif_data_load_data` function in `libexif/exif-data.c` with[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe following changes:[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Added Components:**[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. A new variable `d_end` to track the original buffer boundary [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcalculated as [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`d_orig + ds`[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Boundary validation after processing the APP1 segment length [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m946[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Checks if `d + ds > d_end`[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - If exceeded, caps `ds` to `d_end - d`[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Validates that the capped `ds` is at least [0m[1;36m14[0m[39m bytes[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Logs a corrupt data warning if boundary is exceeded[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Additional validation for `fullds` against actual buffer boundary [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m989[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Checks if `d + fullds > d_end`[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Caps `fullds` to `d_end - d` if exceeded[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Logs a debug message about the capping[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Patch Logic:**[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch attempts to prevent buffer overflows by ensuring that pointer arithmetic [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moperations [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`d + ds` and `d + fullds`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m do not exceed the original buffer boundaries[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mestablished at the start of the function.[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Post-Patch Results[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter applying the patch, the fuzzer produces the following results:[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Identical Error:**[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The same heap-buffer-overflow occurs at the exact same address [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x50600000011f[0m[1;39m)[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The same [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte READ violation is detected[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The memory location is still [0m[1;36m7[0m[39m bytes after the same [0m[1;36m56[0m[39m-byte allocated region[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Call Stack Changes:**[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe call stack is nearly identical with only minor address and line number changes:[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `exif_get_slong` and `exif_get_long` remain in `exif-utils.c` at the same line [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnumbers[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `exif_mnote_data_fuji_load` remains in `fuji/exif-mnote-data-fuji.c` at line [0m[1;36m175[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `exif_data_load_data` is now at line [0m[1;36m1048[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mshifted from [0m[1;36m1025[0m[39m due to added code[0m[1;39m)[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The entry point and fuzzer infrastructure remain unchanged[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Areas for Further Investigation[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mBased on the persistent failure after patching, the following areas require deeper [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minvestigation:[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **exif-utils.c [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexif_get_slong and exif_get_long functions[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:**[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Line [0m[1;36m137[0m[39m in `exif_get_slong` where the actual read violation occurs[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Line [0m[1;36m167[0m[39m in `exif_get_long` which calls `exif_get_slong`[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - These functions may not be receiving proper boundary information or performing[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtheir own boundary checks[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **fuji/exif-mnote-data-fuji.c [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexif_mnote_data_fuji_load function[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:**[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Line [0m[1;36m175[0m[39m where `exif_get_long` is called[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The data being passed to this makernote handler and how buffer sizes are [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcommunicated[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The interface between `exif_data_load_data` and makernote handlers[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **exif-data.c [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexif_data_load_data function[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:**[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The complete data flow after the patched boundary checks[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - How `fullds` is used when calling makernote handlers[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Whether the boundary information is properly propagated to downstream [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunctions[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Data flow analysis:**[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - How buffer pointers and sizes are passed from `exif_data_load_data` to [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`exif_mnote_data_fuji_load`[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Whether the makernote loading functions have their own boundary checking [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmechanisms[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The relationship between the `ds` and `fullds` variables and how they affect [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdownstream processing[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fact that the patch in `exif_data_load_data` did not prevent the overflow [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msuggests that either the boundary checks are not being triggered by the test case, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mor the buffer size information is not being properly communicated to the functions [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhere the actual violation occurs [0m[1;39m([0m[39min the Fuji makernote handler and utility [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunctions[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m199[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mexif_log [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdata->priv->log, EXIF_LOG_CODE_DEBUG, [0m[32m"ExifData"[0m[39m,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m200[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39m  [0m[32m"Tag starts past end of buffer [0m[32m([0m[32m%u > %u[0m[32m)[0m[32m"[0m[39m, doff, [0m [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m256[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m258[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mn->entries[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mtcount[0m[1;39m][0m[39m.format     = exif_get_short [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf + o + [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m, [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mn->order[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m259[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mn->entries[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mtcount[0m[1;39m][0m[39m.components = exif_get_long [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf + o + [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m, [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mn->order[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m260[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mn->entries[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mtcount[0m[1;39m][0m[39m.order      = n->order;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlibexif/olympus/exif-mnote-data-olympus.[0m[1;92mc:350[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m420[0m                                   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m359[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m361[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mo2 += [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m362[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m363[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[35m/[0m[39m*[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m364[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m * Byte order. From here the data offset[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m365[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m * gets calculated.[0m                                                 [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m367[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mdatao = o2;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m368[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39m!strncmp [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m&buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mo2[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, [0m[32m"II"[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m369[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39mn->order = EXIF_BYTE_ORDER_INTEL;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m370[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39melse if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m!strncmp [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m&buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mo2[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, [0m[32m"MM"[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                      [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m380[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m381[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Skip [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m unknown bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m00[0m[39m 2A[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. *[0m[35m/[0m                                 [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m416[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * The format allows specifying the same range of memory as often as it [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcan, so this multiplies quickly. *[0m[35m/[0m                                                 [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m164[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m166[0m[39m:    [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mCHECKOVERFLOW[0m[1;39m([0m[39mn->offset, buf_size, [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m+[0m[1;36m8[0m[39m+[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m167[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mexif_log [0m[1;39m([0m[39men->log, EXIF_LOG_CODE_CORRUPT_DATA,[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m168[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39m  [0m[32m"ExifMnoteDataFuji"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"Short MakerNote"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m169[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m170[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m171[0m[39m:    [0m[39mdatao = [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m + n->offset;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m173[0m[39m:    [0m[39mn->order = EXIF_BYTE_ORDER_INTEL;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m174[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m175[0m[39m:    [0m[39mdatao += exif_get_long [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf + datao + [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, EXIF_BYTE_ORDER_INTEL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m176[0m[39m:    [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mCHECKOVERFLOW[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdatao, buf_size, [0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m177[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mexif_log [0m[1;39m([0m[39men->log, EXIF_LOG_CODE_CORRUPT_DATA,[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m178[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39m  [0m[32m"ExifMnoteDataFuji"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"Short MakerNote"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m179[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m180[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m181[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m182[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Read the number of tags *[0m[35m/[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m183[0m[39m:    [0m[39mc = exif_get_short [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf + datao, EXIF_BYTE_ORDER_INTEL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m184[0m[39m:    [0m[39mdatao += [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m185[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m186[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Just use an arbitrary max tag limit here to avoid needing to much memory[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mor time. There are [0m[1;36m50[0m[39m named tags currently.[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m187[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * Fuji XT2 had [0m[1;36m56[0m[39m entries or so, GFX500 has [0m[1;36m68[0m[39m. [0m[1;36m150[0m[39m seems a safe upper [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbound currently.[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m188[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * The format allows specifying the same range of memory as often as it [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcan, so this multiplies quickly. *[0m[35m/[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m189[0m[39m:    [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc > [0m[1;36m150[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m190[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mexif_log [0m[1;39m([0m[39men->log, EXIF_LOG_CODE_CORRUPT_DATA, [0m[32m"ExifMnoteDataFuji"[0m[39m,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [32m"Too much tags [0m[32m([0m[32m%d[0m[32m)[0m[32m in Fuji MakerNote"[0m[39m, c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m191[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m192[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m193[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m194[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Remove any old entries *[0m[35m/[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m195[0m[39m:    [0m[39mexif_mnote_data_fuji_clear [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m196[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m197[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Reserve enough space for all the possible MakerNote tags *[0m[35m/[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m198[0m[39m:    [0m[39mn->entries = exif_mem_alloc [0m[1;39m([0m[39men->mem, sizeof [0m[1;39m([0m[39mMnoteFujiEntry[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m199[0m[39m:    [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39m!n->entries[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m200[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[1;35mEXIF_LOG_NO_MEMORY[0m[1;39m([0m[39men->log, [0m[32m"ExifMnoteDataFuji"[0m[39m, sizeof [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mMnoteFujiEntry[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m201[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m202[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m203[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m204[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Parse all c entries, storing ones that are successfully parsed *[0m[35m/[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m205[0m[39m:    [0m[39mtcount = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m206[0m[39m:    [0m[39mfor [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = c, o = datao; i; --i, o += [0m[1;36m12[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m207[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39msize_t s;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m208[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m209[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&n->entries[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mtcount[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mMnoteFujiEntry[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m211[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39mexif_log [0m[1;39m([0m[39men->log, EXIF_LOG_CODE_CORRUPT_DATA,[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m212[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39m  [0m[32m"ExifMnoteDataFuji"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"Short MakerNote"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m          [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m215[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m216[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mn->entries[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mtcount[0m[1;39m][0m[39m.tag        = exif_get_short [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf + o, n->order[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m217[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mn->entries[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mtcount[0m[1;39m][0m[39m.format     = exif_get_short [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf + o + [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m, [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mn->order[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m218[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mn->entries[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mtcount[0m[1;39m][0m[39m.components = exif_get_long [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf + o + [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m, [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mn->order[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m219[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mn->entries[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mtcount[0m[1;39m][0m[39m.order      = n->order;[0m                           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m84[0m[39m:     [0m[39mExifMnoteDataFuji *n = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mExifMnoteDataFuji *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ne;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m85[0m[39m:     [0m[39msize_t i, o, s, doff;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m88[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m89[0m[39m:     [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39m!n || !buf || !buf_size[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m90[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m91[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m*[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m92[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * Allocate enough memory for all entries and the number[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m93[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * of entries.[0m                                                              [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m95[0m[39m:     [0m[39m*buf_size = [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m + n->count * [0m[1;36m12[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m96[0m[39m:     [0m[39m*buf = exif_mem_alloc [0m[1;39m([0m[39mne->mem, *buf_size[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m98[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39m*buf_size = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m99[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m100[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m101[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m102[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[39m*[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m103[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * Header: [0m[32m"FUJIFILM"[0m[39m and [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m bytes offset to the first entry.[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m104[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * As the first entry will start right thereafter, the offset is [0m[1;36m12[0m[39m.[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m105[0m[39m:    [0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m106[0m[39m:    [0m[39mmemcpy [0m[1;39m([0m[39m*buf, [0m[32m"FUJIFILM"[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m107[0m[39m:    [0m[39mexif_set_long [0m[1;39m([0m[39m*buf + [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, n->order, [0m[1;36m12[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
