[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m207[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39msize_t s;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m208[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m209[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&n->entries[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mtcount[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mMnoteFujiEntry[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m210[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mCHECKOVERFLOW[0m[1;39m([0m[39mo, buf_size, [0m[1;36m12[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m211[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39mexif_log [0m[1;39m([0m[39men->log, EXIF_LOG_CODE_CORRUPT_DATA,[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m212[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39m  [0m[32m"ExifMnoteDataFuji"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"Short MakerNote"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m213[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39mbreak;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m214[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m215[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m216[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mn->entries[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mtcount[0m[1;39m][0m[39m.tag        = exif_get_short [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf + o, n->order[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m217[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mn->entries[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mtcount[0m[1;39m][0m[39m.format     = exif_get_short [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf + o + [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m, [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mn->order[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m218[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mn->entries[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mtcount[0m[1;39m][0m[39m.components = exif_get_long [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf + o + [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m, [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mn->order[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m219[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mn->entries[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mtcount[0m[1;39m][0m[39m.order      = n->order;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m220[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Root Cause Analysis[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe heap-buffer-overflow occurs at line [0m[1;36m175[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m176[0m[39m after the failed patch[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m in [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`exif_mnote_data_fuji_load` when calling `[0m[1;35mexif_get_long[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf + datao + [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mEXIF_BYTE_ORDER_INTEL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`. The crash happens **during the read operation itself**, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnot after using the value that was read.[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Why the Previous Patch Failed[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe previous patch attempted to:[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Read the offset value: `ExifLong offset_value = [0m[1;35mexif_get_long[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf + datao + [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mEXIF_BYTE_ORDER_INTEL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Validate it: `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39moffset_value > buf_size || datao > buf_size - offset_value[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Use it: `datao += offset_value;`[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**This failed because the buffer overflow occurs in step [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m**, during the [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`exif_get_long` call itself. The validation in step [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m executes after the vulnerable[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmemory access has already occurred, making it ineffective.[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Technical Details[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe code reads [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m bytes from `buf + datao + [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m` where `datao = [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m + n->offset`. For [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthis read to be safe, we need all [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39mat positions `datao + [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m` through `datao [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[1;36m11[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to be within the buffer bounds, requiring `datao + [0m[1;36m12[0m[39m <= buf_size`.[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mWhile there is a check at line [0m[1;36m166[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;35mCHECKOVERFLOW[0m[1;39m([0m[39mn->offset, buf_size, [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m+[0m[1;36m8[0m[39m+[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat should theoretically catch this, the crash still occurs. This indicates we [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mneed a more defensive approach: validate the exact position being accessed [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mimmediately before the access occurs.[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAdd a validation check **immediately before** the `exif_get_long` call at line [0m[1;36m175[0m[39m [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto ensure that reading [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m bytes from `buf + datao + [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m` is safe.[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Implementation Steps [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfrom initial codebase[0m[1;39m)[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Location**: Insert validation between line [0m[1;36m171[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwhere `datao` is calculated[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand line [0m[1;36m175[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwhere the vulnerable read occurs[0m[1;39m)[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Add the check**:[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```c[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Validate that we can safely read the [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m-byte offset value from the header *[0m[35m/[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mCHECKOVERFLOW[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdatao + [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, buf_size, [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       exif_log [0m[1;39m([0m[39men->log, EXIF_LOG_CODE_CORRUPT_DATA,[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m                 [0m[32m"ExifMnoteDataFuji"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"Offset position in MakerNote header exceeds [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [32mbuffer bounds"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       return;[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **What this check validates**:[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Using the CHECKOVERFLOW macro, it checks: `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdatao + [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m >= buf_size[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m || [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m4[0m[39m > [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuf_size[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m || [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdatao + [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m > buf_size - [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This ensures `datao + [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m <= buf_size`, meaning all [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m bytes at positions [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mdatao+[0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, datao+[0m[1;36m11[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` are within bounds[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - It also catches integer overflow in the `datao + [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m` calculation [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfirst [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcondition[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Preserve existing logic**: Keep all existing checks including:[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Line [0m[1;36m166[0m[39m: Initial validation of `n->offset`[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Line [0m[1;36m176[0m[39m: Validation of `datao` after adding the offset value[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - All subsequent validations in the function[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Why This Approach is Optimal[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Defense in Depth**: While the check at line [0m[1;36m166[0m[39m should theoretically suffice, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39madding validation immediately before use provides an additional safety layer and [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfollows the principle of validating data at the point of use.[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Consistency with Codebase**: This follows the same pattern used elsewhere in [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe Fuji implementation:[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Line [0m[1;36m210[0m[39m: `[0m[1;35mCHECKOVERFLOW[0m[1;39m([0m[39mo, buf_size, [0m[1;36m12[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` before reading entry headers[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Line [0m[1;36m246[0m[39m: `[0m[1;35mCHECKOVERFLOW[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdataofs, buf_size, s[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` before reading entry data[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Minimal Gap Between Check and Use**: By placing the validation immediately [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbefore the `exif_get_long` call, we minimize the opportunity for any intermediate [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moperations to invalidate our assumptions.[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Uses Existing Infrastructure**: The fix uses the CHECKOVERFLOW macro already [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpresent in the codebase, maintaining consistency with the existing validation [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpatterns.[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Correct Ordering**: Unlike the failed patch, this validates **before** the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mread operation occurs, not after.[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Side Effects and Mitigation[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Potential Side Effects**:[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- May reject some malformed but previously [0m[32m"accepted"[0m[39m MakerNote data[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Slightly increases validation overhead [0m[1;39m([0m[39mminimal performance impact[0m[1;39m)[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Mitigation**:[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- This is actually desirable behavior - rejecting invalid data prevents undefined [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbehavior[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The function already returns early for invalid data, so the control flow remains [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mconsistent[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Error logging provides visibility into why the MakerNote was rejected[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Similar Patterns in Codebase[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe Olympus MakerNote implementation shows a similar defensive pattern [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m251[0m[39m [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand line [0m[1;36m405[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m where it validates the offset position after calculation and before [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39muse. Our fix applies this same principle to the Fuji implementation.[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Complete Fix Context[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fix should be inserted after line [0m[1;36m173[0m[39m in the original code:[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m171[0m[39m:    [0m[39mdatao = [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m + n->offset;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m172[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m173[0m[39m:    [0m[39mn->order = EXIF_BYTE_ORDER_INTEL;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m174[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m[[0m[39mINSERT FIX HERE - validate datao + [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m before reading[0m[1;39m][0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m175[0m[39m:    [0m[39mdatao += exif_get_long [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf + datao + [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, EXIF_BYTE_ORDER_INTEL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis ensures the pointer `buf + datao + [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m` is validated before being dereferenced [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mby `exif_get_long`, preventing the heap-buffer-overflow.[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                   [0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.END                      ]8;id=107869;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=982986;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\
[2;36m                    [0m         [1m([0mn evals: [1;36m4[0m, patch status: PatchStatus.SOUND[1m)[0m                                        [2m               [0m
[2;36m                   [0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Building environment                                                                 ]8;id=297860;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/framework/context_builder/services/aixcc/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=549993;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/framework/context_builder/services/aixcc/__init__.py#132\[2m132[0m]8;;\
